front.title: •All Too Easy
front.gametext: If an opponent's character at the Carbonite Chamber was just 'hit' by a lightsaber, deploy on that character. Character is instead immediately captured and 'frozen.' If captive released, lose Immediate Effect. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: 'Perhaps you are not as strong as the Emperor thought.'

combo: All Too Easy + Dark Jedi Lightsaber + Bounty
All Too Easy + Emperor Palpatine + Death Star: Detention Block Corridor + The Emperor's Prize
